verses.name: Jeremiah 18:12
verses.text: And they said, There is no hope: but we will walk after our own devices, and we will every one do the imagination of his evil heart.

verses.name: Jeremiah 18:13
verses.text: Therefore thus saith the Lord; Ask ye now among the heathen, who hath heard such things: the virgin of Israel hath done a very horrible thing.

verses.name: Jeremiah 18:14
verses.text: Will a man leave the snow of Lebanon which cometh from the rock of the field? or shall the cold flowing waters that come from another place be forsaken?
